ItemTooltips.ring_of_protection: Offers early game armor and will be built to Tranquil boot. (Both boot and Ring of Regen can be bought from safe lane secret shop)
ItemTooltips.power_treads: Extra HP and extra attack speed, just what Luna needs. This is now the preferred boots over Tranquil boots following the changes introduced in 6.79.
ItemTooltips.bracer: Cost-effective HP/stats boost and can be built into Drums laters.
ItemTooltips.assault: If no one else from the team can build AC then it's not a bad choice for Luna.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: Magic immunity is a must in late game team fight.
ItemTooltips.monkey_king_bar: A good counter to enemy carry with high evasion.
ItemTooltips.butterfly: A must for most agi carry heroes, it gives Luna more right-click powers and make her moon glavies bouncing like crazy. Also, the passive evasion is imperative in late-game man fights.
ItemTooltips.manta: More push power and can be used to dispel some negative effects on Luna like entangle.
ItemTooltips.satanic: Natural progression from Helm of Dominator
ItemTooltips.helm_of_the_dominator: HoD provides Luna a good sustain on her lane, and you should always dominate a creep (range unit preferred) to help you stack neutral camps.
ItemTooltips.yasha:
The extra movement speed greatly enhances Luna's chasing power and also helps to land more hits from her ultimate.

Built into Manta in late game.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: A nature progression from bracer and the extra int can be useful for just one more beam.
ItemTooltips.tranquil_boots:
Help stay in the lane and abuse opponent with Luna's high right-click damage. Also help Luna to farm jungles.

It can be disassembled and built to treads.

The recent nerf has made this less attractive but still a decent choice in early games. However, you may want to build it to treads earlier.
